title: Beyond Meat Slides After Downgrade
text:
Beyond Meat Slides After Downgrade

Stock Markets 2 hours ago (Sep 23, 2019 11:35AM ET)

Investing.com - Plant-based meat alternative maker Beyond Meat (NASDAQ: ) isn’t all it's cut out to be, analysts at Exane BNP Paribas (PA: ) said on Monday. The French research firm initiated coverage of the company with an underperform rating a price target of $70. The stock slumped 4% in midday trade. "While plant-based meats will grow rapidly, we believe that barriers to entry are negligible; we thus struggle to justify BYND's valuation," analysts noted.

Beyond Meat Slides After Downgrade
